body: Phew Ik glad that first story wasnt ntr, it was so sweet I got worried
I wish the chapter titles got translated more often. What's the 101-116 title? Otherwise @chabode, 177-End is a continuation of 61-100.

lemme give u all some enlightment, we have 3 long stories and 2 shorties. from pg 5-44, pg 45-60, pg 61-100, pg 101-116, and pg 117-end. i do believe mostly NTR tag comes off from last stories which situated at NTR w/ i, not e.
Not all NTR.  Even if it NTR it not that cruel compare to previous work.
Shitty art and even shittier comments lol
the final, NTR chapter felt pretty pointless. Why do you people get so worked up over that?

actually @Sir Dragon and @Pentagram Industries this one has 2 pairs at start who are never seen again after their respective chapters, then we got a chapter about a girl cheating on her boyfriend with her male childhood friend. next chapter that same couple but a second girl joins in. next chapter or two(i can't tell if its one chapter or two different ones) is about a girl who is seduced by her home tutor her mother hires to help her study, and after that her female friend is also seduced.. both women of course were some poor saps childhood friends/potential love interests... the teach that seduces them gets said poor sap to fuck them and summarily kicks him away and becomes a one man show again and keeps them for himself... after that the group of three from just before come back for some last minute sex.... theres ntr i guess but the only REAL guys who get cocked is one guy who only shows up on a single page and another guy we never see.
@nchris @DarkAngel2224 I'd prefer if we not kill anyone thanks...

From what I understand, we have 2 Pairs, then a Teacher appeares and Fucks the two girls of the Pairs into Submission
@Pentagram Industries , I don't think I'd reconmend this one , skip it because the NTR begins in the last third already
I want to know which pages contain NTR before reading; I don't want to favorite this blindly.
